tool_description: This API provides functionality to build a recipe site and meal planning system which can be connected to an online grocery store. For demonstration of a site implementing the API please visit https://madplan.nu. The API documentation is in progress, meaning more methods is being added during the next months.
name: Recipes to grocery store
title: Recipes to grocery store

api_list.name: GetRecipe
api_list.description: Gets the details for a specific recipe.

required_parameters.name: RecipeId
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe to get data for.

required_parameters.name: Servings
required_parameters.description: Number of servings. Use "0" to obtain default servings used when this recipe was created.

api_list.name: GetCategories
api_list.description: Gets a list of all categories.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dp.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dp.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: SetFavoriteRecipe
api_list.description: Sets a user favorite recipe.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The method to call on the server.

required_parameters.name: DeviceId
required_parameters.description: The unique id of the client calling the method.

required_parameters.name: UserId
required_parameters.description: The id of the user.

required_parameters.name: RecipeId
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe to flag for favorite.

required_parameters.name: IsFavorite
required_parameters.description: Should the recipe be flagged as a favorite, 0 for false, 1 for true.

api_list.name: GetMealBoxCategories
api_list.description: Gets all categories for meal boxes.

required_parameters.name: targetstoreid
required_parameters.description: Identifies the categories to use for this request. If no recipes attached to a category, category will not be included in the result returned.

api_list.name: GetFavoriteRecipes
api_list.description: Get the recipes the user has flagged as favorites.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The name of the method to call.

required_parameters.name: UserId
required_parameters.description: The id of the user requesting the data.

required_parameters.name: deviceid
required_parameters.description: The unique id of the device requesting the data.

optional_parameters.name: PageIndex
optional_parameters.description: The page index to get data for.

optional_parameters.name: PageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of recipes to return pr. page.

api_list.name: GetCollectedRecipes
api_list.description: Gets the recipes the user has added to his meal plan.

required_parameters.name: rnd
required_parameters.description: A random string to ensure you do not get a cached version from somewhere.

optional_parameters.name: WeekToken
optional_parameters.description: Can be used to automatic add recipes from some custom logic to this users meal plan before retrieving the collected recipes. Leave it blank.

api_list.name: SetMealDate
api_list.description: Set the date and time for a recipe on the meal plan.

required_parameters.name: CollectId
required_parameters.description: The id of the record to make the change to.

required_parameters.name: mealdate
required_parameters.description: the date and time in the format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm

api_list.name: GetListsOfValues
api_list.description: Gets list of values to be used with drop downs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dp.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://dp.p.rapidapi.com/"

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetRecipesByFreeText
api_list.description: Gets a list of recipes. Max number of recipes returned is limited to 50.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The text to search for in the recipes.

api_list.name: AddRecipeToMealPlan
api_list.description: Adds a recipe to the users meal plan.

required_parameters.name: Servings
required_parameters.description: The amount of servings to add.

required_parameters.name: MealDate
required_parameters.description: Use "0" to add to next free slot, or use format 2014-11-05T13:15:30.

required_parameters.name: recipeid
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe to add to the meal plan.

api_list.name: GetTabRecipes
api_list.description: Get 3 sets of recipe data (popular, new and recommended)

required_parameters.name: PageSize
required_parameters.description: The number of recipes to return in each dataset.

api_list.name: RemoveCollectedRecipes
api_list.description: Removes all recipes form the meal plan.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dp.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetDefaultSupplierMappingByRecipe
api_list.description: Gets a list of products that if purchased matches the ingredients attached to the recipe.

required_parameters.name: RecipeId
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe to get the mapping for.

required_parameters.name: Servings
required_parameters.description: The amount of servings to calculate product mappings for. If 0, we use recipe default.

required_parameters.name: DepartmentId
required_parameters.description: If the supplier has multiple departments for delivering groceries, this will identify the department.

required_parameters.name: supplierid
required_parameters.description: The supplier to get the mapping for. This is only an option if the system you build should be connected to an online supermarket.

required_parameters.name: supplierpriceconfiguration
required_parameters.description: The products to display for this recipe if multiple products have been attached to each ingredient. Possible values at the moment are: DefaultSelection = 0, CheapestPossible = 1, Organic = 2.

api_list.name: GetRecipesInCategory
api_list.description: Gets the recipes for a specific category. TODO: Add current page and total number of pages to response.

required_parameters.name: MealCatId
required_parameters.description: The id of the category to get the recipes for.

required_parameters.name: PageIndex
required_parameters.description: The page to retrieve from the server.

optional_parameters.name: PageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of recipes per page.

api_list.name: SetConfirmItemsReceivedAtSupplier
api_list.description: Supermarket must call this method just after meal plan was transferred to basket from foreign domain.

required_parameters.name: OrderIdDraft
required_parameters.description: The draft id created when converting the meal plan to a basket.

required_parameters.name: DraftKey
required_parameters.description: A uniqueidentifier in the format DF452C8E-DE33-425A-8958-77E697384928. This identifier is generated when meal plan is converted to ingredients.

api_list.name: GetMealBoxRecipes
api_list.description: Gets a list of recipes for a specific meal box.

required_parameters.name: MealBoxId
required_parameters.description: The id of the meal box to get the recipes for.

required_parameters.name: log
required_parameters.description: Should the request be logged and data used in analytics such as most viewed meal boxes. Default is 0. Possible values 0 or 1.

api_list.name: RemoveRecipeFromMealPlan
api_list.description: Removes a recipe form the meal plan.

required_parameters.name: CollectId
required_parameters.description: The id representing the row to delete in the DB.

required_parameters.name: RecipeId
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe to remove from the meal plan.

api_list.name: SetConfirmOrderFromSupplier
api_list.description: Confirms that a meal plan was converted to an order and payment accepted.

required_parameters.name: OrderIdDraft
required_parameters.description: An id generated when the meal plan is converted to ingredients, but before receiving payment.

required_parameters.name: TransactionId
required_parameters.description: The transaction id for the payment, used for tracking back.

required_parameters.name: SupplierOrderTotalPrice
required_parameters.description: The total amount of the basket, which was paid in the transaction.

required_parameters.name: SupplierNewCustomer
required_parameters.description: A value indicating if this was the first order the customer placed at the online supermarket.

required_parameters.name: draftkey
required_parameters.description: A uniqueidentifier in the format DF452C8E-DE33-425A-8958-77E697384928. This identifier is generated when meal plan is converted to ingredients.

required_parameters.name: supplierorderid
required_parameters.description: The order id this transaction was given at the online supermarket. Used for tracking and linking data.

api_list.name: GetGroceryListByUserId
api_list.description: Gets the sum of grocery list for the current user. If UserId is 0, data stored on DeviceId is used in stead. If UserId > 0 we check if DeviceId is associated with UserId on backend.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dp.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://dp.p.rapidapi.com/"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: SetRecipeCollectServings
api_list.description: Sets the number of servings on the meal plan for a given recipe.

required_parameters.name: CollectId
required_parameters.description: The id in the DB to update data for.

required_parameters.name: Servings
required_parameters.description: The number of servings to set for the recipe on the meal plan.

api_list.name: GetMealBoxesByCategoryId
api_list.description: Gets the meal boxes attached to a specific category.

required_parameters.name: TargetStoreId
required_parameters.description: The id of the store to get the list of meal boxes for.

required_parameters.name: MealBoxCategoryId
required_parameters.description: The id of the category to get the meal boxes for.

api_list.name: GetListOfIngredientsUsedInRecipes
api_list.description: Gets a complete list of ingredients used in recipes.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: A text used in a like filter on the ingredients to return. Leave empty to return all ingredients.

api_list.name: GetWeeklyMealPlan
api_list.description: Gets the recipes for a specific weekly meal plan.

required_parameters.name: WeeklyId
required_parameters.description: The id of the meal plan to get the recipes for. Use 0 for current week.
